data.title: A chocolate lovers dream
data.text: The best truffles I have ever had. And in the summer, they make a garden mint ice cream that is honestly beyond compare. Don't want to wait in a long line? Go to their take out door.

data.title: Just ok
data.text: Everyone was really nice, but the chocolate is a little expensive and not great. It was worth a second to check out though.

data.title: Blew us away
data.text: This little shop often has a line out the door but you don't wait too long and it is worth it. Fantastic selection of pastries, drinks and chocolates. A bit crowded inside but in decent weather the square and nearby park are great. A must-do; our family enjoyed this as much or more than anything else in Asheville.

data.title: Good sugar rush !!
data.text: Varied selection, excellent service .. quality coffee and got chocolate. Walked out of there with enough chocolate to last three life times.. good place

data.title: Good but not great
data.text: There's always a line so you figure it must be amazing.  We ordered 4 different items to share and none were exceptional.  Maybe we just missed the best items,  but it seems like a very pricey chocolate fix.

data.title: so fun
data.text: I haven't been to the Chocolate Lounge since it moved, and the new location is really nice. They have a fantastic spread of desserts, and I wish I could try them all! Can definitely recommend the mocha stout cake (mmm), any of their truffles are fun, and they had some sort of honey mascarpone parfait that was really good. You'll have to wait in line, but it's worth it!

data.title: Standing in Line is Worth the Wait
data.text: Did you want dessert?  Plain and simple, go here.  The chocolate is wonderful.  The kitchens are nearby so everything is fresh and delectable.  Get the French Press for coffee.  I love the cakes.  If you go when Asheville is in peek tourist mode, you will wait.  But it would be a shame to miss out if you are visiting Asheville.

data.title: Very Rich, Unique Chocolate
data.text: Wow! I've never had chocolate quite like this place provides its customers. We waited in line for about 30 minutes to try the dark chocolate liquid truffle and chocolate mousse. The liquid truffle was just too much and I LOVE chocolate. I couldn't finish it because it was so rich. My husband and I really enjoyed the chocolate mousse. It was very rich as well, but not quite as heavy on the stomach. I would go back for the mousse, but I wouldn't order the liquid truffle again. If you really like chocolate, I would give this place a shot, but be ready to wait in line for a little bit. I would plan to share with someone even though portions appear small. The dishes are pretty rich. Get some water before you sit down.

data.title: Of course this place is excellent... look where it is!
data.text: Yum.  Great.  Bloork.  Bleep.  Bloop.  Chocolate shake... boom boom boom.  Wunderbar.  Excelente!  Grand!   I slurped into a coma.

data.title: If you love chocolate then this is the place!
data.text: I have tried many things here now, and this is the best place I have ever been for Chocolate.   Their many different chocolate cakes are amazing.   The chocolate truffle drink is liquid gold.  Then also all their truffles and many other chocolate choices are outstanding as well.  I highly recommend it for all chocolate lovers!

data.title: A special treat
data.text:
While visiting Asheville, we all developed a sweet tooth after dinner. We did not understand why there was such a long wait until we experienced some incredible treats.

We all had a version of their brownies and shared a salted caramel liquid truffle. All were amazing and worth the wait.

data.title: Chocolate-lover's heaven
data.text:
This place not only produces some of the best chocolate treats you've ever had, they're a shining example of excellent business practices.  They invest in and pay living wages in their source farms, and do a lot of good around town as well.  

Check out their downstairs chocolate shop for a quick treat or gifts to go!

data.title: Yuuuum.
data.text: We really lived the liquid truffle, the carrot cake and the chocolate mousse. We did not enjoy the triffle of the day. It was strange. The honey lavender liquid truffle was a serious highlight!

data.title: OH MY GOSH!
data.text: OH MY GOSH! I honestly had no idea where to start here. Truly the best place you could go for dessert like ever. They were very willing to try and put different things together and to truly "make" an amazing dessert even better. LOVE LOVE LOVE!

data.title: Fantastic
data.text: One of my favorite stops in Asheville! Chocolate truffles to take home, hot chocolate, chocolate mousse, cake...your hearts desire!

data.title: Loved the truffle sip!
data.text: Got the milk chocolate truffle sip and it was wonderful! I had it the last two days and wished I had been there the first day so I could've had it everyday.

data.title: Dream Come True
data.text:
The most delicious, sumptious, chocolate molten cake I have ever eaten. If you need a chocolate fix, This is it! 
Equally wonderful chocolate truffles. WOW!

data.title: Sinfully good
data.text: I stop into this place every time I visit Asheville. Everything is sinfully good! I buy a couple mixed boxes of chocolates for friends each time & they all rave about them. Also the hot chocolate is so rich & creamy, and I really enjoyed the chocolate creme brulee as well. Really, you can't go wrong here!

data.title: Wow!
data.text: There's no place else like it. It's like dying and going to chocolate heaven. They offered everything from truffles the cakes the chocolate drinks.

data.title: Trendy little dessert bar.
data.text: I read reviews for this place and wanted to check it out. The dessert options were great (it's hard to choose something because everything looks so good), ambience is nice and it is a good place to go on a date and people watch. I tried the Pot De Creme and after a couple of bites, I was done because it was very rich. Wish I had of picked something else or just split it with my husband.
